welcome.title: European Languages with AI
welcome.subtitle: Dialogues for Life
welcome.text1: Create personalized dialogues in any of the available European languages by specifying your level, topic, and keywords.
welcome.text2: The application is your personal tutor, offering unique training modes: from simple text familiarization to practicing pronunciation and translation skills.
welcome.text3: Get instant feedback, detailed grammatical and lexical analysis, adapted to your level.

auth.errUser: User with this email address not found.
auth.errEmail: This email address is already in use.
auth.errDefault: An error occurred. Please try again later.

all.notDialogs: You don't have any dialogs yet.

profile.title: Profile
profile.analysis: Lexical and grammar analysis of dialogues (AI)
profile.logoutConfirmMsg: Are you sure you want to log out?
profile.deleteConfirmMsg: Warning! This action is irreversible. All your data and dialogues will be permanently deleted.

view.inPro: Dialog analysis is available in the PRO version.
view.unlock: Unlock all the features of the app!
view.description1: You've fully used your free PRO access limit for today â€” that's our daily gift!
view.description2: To continue using all PRO features without restrictions, get a subscription.
view.description3: Get unlimited access now and use them as much as you need.
view.description4: Switch to a PRO subscription and get maximum benefits today!
view.endPro: Last PRO access for today used.
view.deleteConfirmMsg: Are you sure you want to delete this dialogue?

new.error: An error occurred while creating the dialogue. Try again.

modal.title: Dialogue completed.
modal.text: Great job! You can listen to it, analyze it, or start the training again.

level1.description: Listen to the line, read the original and translation. Step by step. Repeat the phrase or the entire dialogue at any time.
level1.descriptionMobile: Listen, read, and repeat step by step.

level2.description: Check your pronunciation and fix mistakes. Move through the dialogue step by step, repeating its parts for perfect mastery.
level2.descriptionMobile: Speak boldly and correctly! Check your pronunciation and fix mistakes.
level2.info: 'Microphone': say the line. Press again to check for errors.

level3.description: Translate the line, speak it into 'Microphone'. Press again to activate semantic error analysis. Perfect for training fast and accurate speaking.
level3.descriptionMobile: Analysis of semantic errors in your translation.
level3.info: 'Microphone': say the line. Press again to check translation.

level4.description: Listen to the line and choose the correct translation from the suggested cards. Train your listening comprehension in the context of a real dialogue.
level4.descriptionMobile: Check how well you understand live speech.

store.resultError: Failed to load analysis. Try again.
store.trError: Failed to verify translation. Try again.
store.delDialogError: Failed to delete dialogue. Try again.
store.noSpeechApi: Speech recognition is not supported in this browser.
store.proDemo: This is how the voice sounds in the PRO version. Much better, isn't it?
